testcase.title: 001)Check Chinese locale is displayed on Advanced Search Page for localization

steps.title: I logged in as a "Localization" user with access to "CE-4" project

substeps.message: New Home page logged in  properly and Locale Icon is Displayed

steps.title: the "HomePage" page should be loaded on log on with Locale Dropdown
I verify "Chinese" language should listed under the Locale Dropdown and Select check-box against Chinese
I click on Advanced Search Link

substeps.message: New Advanced Search page Loaded Properly With Chinese Text

On 'AdvancedSearch' Chinese localization verification ***FAILED*** for 'Advanced Search' with the key 'advSearchTitle' in properties file. Reason for failure: content From Properties File ???? - and the Content displayed on UI Advanced Search - are NOT matching

On 'AdvancedSearch' Chinese localization verification ***FAILED*** for 'Search Strategy' with the key 'advSearchStrategy' in properties file. Reason for failure: content From Properties File ???? and the Content displayed on UI Search Strategy are NOT matching

On 'AdvancedSearch' Chinese localization verification ***FAILED*** for '(non-editable)' with the key 'advSearchStrategyNonEdit' in properties file. Reason for failure: content From Properties File (????) and the Content displayed on UI (non-editable) are NOT matching

On 'AdvancedSearch' Chinese localization verification ***FAILED*** for 'Add an additional search field' with the key 'aadvSearchAddField' in properties file. Reason for failure: content From Properties File ???????? and the Content displayed on UI Add an additional search field are NOT matching

On 'AdvancedSearch' Chinese localization verification ***FAILED*** for 'Reset' with the key 'advSearchReset' in properties file. Reason for failure: content From Properties File ?? and the Content displayed on UI Reset are NOT matching

On 'AdvancedSearch' Chinese localization verification ***FAILED*** for 'SEARCH' with the key 'advSearchBtn' in properties file. Reason for failure: content From Properties File ?? and the Content displayed on UI SEARCH are NOT matching
